title: Why am I being banned?
body:
I was encouraging positive play by communicating with my team, I was reinforcing good morale by saying "good job", i was relaying important information about summoner spells, and then I begin getting abused by the enemy team and ask them to stop being so toxic. How am I in the wrong here? From an objective standpoint, I was not toxic at all, or effeminately not toxic enough to receive a permanent ban AFTER ONE GAME!

I think we all know it takes a total of 10 games where the person is reported for being toxic for a tribunal case to take place and a ban to be dished out. However what we have no info on is what happens if you are reported after your ban has ended. Does it have to be another set of 10 from then?, its sounds like he just came out of a ban.

I assume it goes to a zero tolerance stage when any report will lead to an immediate ban. Which I believe has happened in this case, since he mentions something about not taking into account of his previous ban. 

In my opinion if you displayed the full chat cause I have reason to believe some dialogues are missing as well as we dnt know what the others were saying so its a one sided story. But as for a solution just launch a support ticket to riot, They will not reveal details of the ban or the procedure they took but however they will review the game and their evidence.

Keep in mind there have been instances in the past where accounts have been unbanned but very rare. Even so if you have proper evidence and that is the game you were reported for than there might be some hope.

To clarify, I had a 2 week ban, I then came back and played 1 ranked game, and bam! Banned again (for this game) and no I haven't left a single thing out. This is the entire chat, the only chat and my final chat. It is ridiculous.
